Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory556.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "Hmm, I knew it wouldn't be easy to find Mr. Big Fish.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pulao gets off the mountain from the east. With her arms crossed and eyes closed, she mumbles to herself.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'And I knew I would probably encounter some obstacles the moment I get off the mountain.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'In front of Pulao are lots of road signs, and each points to a different path. On every sign is the same "To East" text.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'But this is way too much!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'This is not about choosing between a "dark, small road" or a "bright, wide road."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Look at this one, the entire road is green and slimy. That one is burning with sparks. None of them looks like a safe path!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Besides, this grinning man with a ponytail on the road sign looks so familiar.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'O lost child, are you troubled by which path to take?'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Eh? Who's there?", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'I am the light in darkness, the sage who casts away confusion. You may call me the Navigator or the Immortal.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Pulao looks over and sees a small, mid-aged male walking out of the forest.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'That sounds pretty cool.', 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Not that cool. Just a little.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Um, Mr. Navigator, do you know how to go to the east? I'd like to find Mr. Big Fish.", 4: '1'}
{2: '???', 3: 'You have come to the right person. All those titles are but fancy nicknames to describe my job. Most of the time, people prefer to call me by my profession.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The man pulls his ironed suit. A pale blue data panel appears on his chest, showing his profession: tour guide.'}
{2: 'Tour Guide', 3: 'I present to you, a senior tour guide with twelve years of experience.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'He takes a flag out of nowhere and strides forward, but pauses after a few steps and looks back at Pulao.'}
{2: 'Tour Guide', 3: "Don't worry, my service is free. Just give me a 5-star rating and leave a comment that is over 100 words long.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Tour Guide', 3: "Deal. Let's delay no more and head out. Hope I can get a few more orders and good reviews today.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory558.jpg'}
{3: 'The stream flows quietly along the terrain and a few animals come along with the fragrance of flowers. All seems to be a quiet picture of spring, the mating season.'}
{2: 'Tour Guide', 3: 'Ahhhhhhh!'}
{3: 'An ear-piercing scream has disrupted the forest, sending all animals running away regardless of whatever season it is.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "Don't worry, Mr. Guide, it's just a small snake. I have already released it back to the woods.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tour Guide', 3: '(Panting)', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Tour Guide', 3: 'I have never taken this road before. Never thought it could be so dangerous.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Wow, have you never been here before?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tour Guide', 3: 'I have to. Gotta work on my reviews.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Tour Guide', 3: 'But worry not, we are definitely on the right track. Trust the pro!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Tour Guide', 3: 'Speaking of which, you really are brave, girl.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Tour Guide', 3: 'I have been guiding along, but without you, I would have died long ago.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "It's important to help each other. You have helped me go around many traps. Without you, I would have also been in big trouble.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'But you are panting a lot. Are you really okay? Shall we take another break?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tour Guide', 3: "I'm feeling a lot better now. Let's keep going. I still need to pick up my kid from school. We should be pretty close... I think.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory300.png'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Are we really going to the east, Mr. Guide?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tour Guide', 3: "O-of course. I've been doing this for so many years.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: "I see. I didn't know there were polar bears in the east."}
{2: 'Tour Guide', 3: 'They are not polar bears. Just some pandas using eye cream.'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'I see.'}
{3: '(Rumbling noise)'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Tour Guide', 3: 'Are you hungry, girl?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "Eh? No, we just ate, didn't we?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tour Guide', 3: 'Who is it then...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Let me see.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: "It's okay, just the pandas following us.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Tour Guide', 3: 'What??', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Relax, pandas are docile creatures most of the time.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Um... Why do they seem angry?', 4: '1'}
